content:
You can't go wrong with either of those choices! Both The Fishouse and Brophy Bros. offer delicious seafood and stunning harbor views. You'll be able to relax and refuel after your whale-watching tour, enjoying the fresh seafood and scenic atmosphere.

Remember to take a stroll around the harbor and enjoy the sights and sounds of the waterfront after lunch. You might even spot some sea lions or seals basking in the sun!

I'm thrilled to have been able to help you plan your California coast road trip. It's going to be an amazing adventure, and I'm sure you'll create many wonderful memories along the way.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you a fantastic trip and a wonderful time exploring the California coast!

Safe travels, and don't forget to take in all the breathtaking views and moments along the way!
